Psygai spammed my journal and tried to talk trash on me like it would get a rise out of me. Now.. it's one thing to do it over and over, but I did it once and one of them specifically made a journal JUST to comment on mine. How special am I? They gave me some abuse of my own ( probably well deserved ), but it was basically just what i said about them. Blah blah blah, you're ugly. I'm apparently fat from my CHEST UP shots. I do have some chub in the face, but that's really it. And tried to give me the "Well how good is YOUR music?" thing, when it had nothing to do with thier music. I just thought it was funny. Anyway, I could give a crap what a bunch of people in Brazil think. Especially when this so-called band comments on my journal and tries to start some sort of internet drama. Sorry boys, I don't care for you, or your existence in the world. Do what you like. You were brought up once, and never entered my mind after that. One more thing, seriously, grow up. Who starts drama over an internet journal? ANYWAY. Back to your regularly scheduled programming.

So the new FAKE? album is highly disappointing. There's only one song that I really really like, which is TURNING EVERYBODY AWAY. Other than that the album itself is pretty boring and bland. PULSE and JUST LIKE BILLY were good and are on the album, so I guess those three songs are the high points. How disappointing. Best new album so far still goes to Laruku!
The new L'arc~en~Ciel album, AWAKE, is quite a good CD! I'll do a review of it soon.

One of those times where I actually write something. Something lame, sappy, and possibly depressing.


I could see you passing me, but getting smaller and smaller
For a moment I question just why I feel this way
A hand extends in a moment of desperation
Even if it seems that you're letting yourself escape me
Feeling helpless, I can do nothing but watch you go

Goodbye my dear, somewhere lost in the clouds
the sun can set and the moon can rise
Goodbye my love, my heart still beats, but echoes a hollow sound

I can still remember being so close to you
But it would seem that we're meant to be so far away
My journey towards what seemed to be in my grasp
It's now a twisted path of hope and despair
You could light the way for me, but you're nowhere..
Nowhere to be found..

Goodbye my dear, somewhere lost in the clouds
the sun can set and the moon can rise
Goodbye my love, my heart still beats, but reflects a certain lonliness

And still, while I continue to search
The sun falls upon me, burning in towards my soul
And still, without any hope, I persist
The moon shines itself down, revealing my true self
And still, reaching for you, a dot in the sky
Wishing that you could hold me
Wishing..

At about 1AM my grandmother passed away. RIP grandma. I love you.

I'm actually very relieved. We were about to put her on hospice. That's where you put someone in a nursing home and give them drugs to dull the pain until they pass. My grandma was always too stubborn to let anyone help her with anything, so I guess she decided to pass on her own terms. It's much better that way.

Now comes the hard part. The wake and the funeral. I guess no one likes those. Ah well.

now i just stare into the sun and i see everything i've done i think i could have been someone but i can't stop what has begun when everything is said and done and there is no place left to run i think i used to be someone now i just stare into the sun

I hate essays, well, just for my english class because.. well, my teacher nit-picks everything I do because I have "an amazing writing ability".

Anyway, I have to write a persuasive essay on teen suicide and self-destruction. My side will be trying to persuade the reader to see how.. stupid ( for lack of a better word ) it is. Any ideas? Help/opinions are appreciated.
Alright, see that banner down there? Join! NOW! But only if you have prior knowledge to Sugizo/Luna Sea/any related projects. DO IT YOU SUCKERS.
Depressed guys. Cheer me up or something. :\

I woke up this morning depressed. Probably for a number of reasons. How annoying. I don't have time for depression.

For one, I feel like I'm losing a trusted and close friend. Granted, people change and that's great if they're comfortable with who they're changing into. But, I felt like there was a certain.. understanding between us. Like we were on the same level. Now with this change it doesn't.. feel like the same person, and I feel like that bond is broken, almost gone. It's really saddening when I think about it because I never get sad over someone who's just a friend. I'm glad though, that there was nothing done to me to make me dislike her. It's a change that comes with age I suppose. But still, I can't help but feel like I'm being left behind..

01> Total volume of music files on my computer?: Uhh.. alot? There's a little over 2000 files.

02> The last CD I bought was: BUCK-TICK's Dress (Bloody Trinity Mix) single. Because I don't have the money for an album at the moment. ^D^

03> a. The last song I listened to before writing this was: BUCK-TICK ~ Seraphim

03> b. Song playing right now: BUCK-TICK - Muma -The Nightmare- ( My absolute favorite song. )

04> Five songs I listen to a lot or that mean a lot to me: 

1. BUCK-TICK ~ Long Distance Call: This song is an absolutely gorgeous song and makes me think of my darling Mai. It's a bit sad, so it moves me a bit. Hard to do musically! But B-T never fails to impress.

2. Atsushi Sakurai ~ Taiji: A rather upbeat love song that I can never get enough of. I can listen to and sing this song all day if I wanted to.

3. BUCK-TICK ~ ROMANCE -Incubo-: I love a good romantic song, even if it's a dark love song. I love the idea of "dark love". This song makes me just want to dance and spin. ^D^

4. BUCK-TICK ~ Nocturne ~Rain Song~: This song always relaxes me. Sometimes I even fall asleep to it, just because of how it makes me think of being showered on by a cool spring rain. I absolutely love that feeling and Atsushi's vocals are just so pleasing in this song.

5. BUCK-TICK ~ Muma -The Nightmare-: This song means alot to me because when I was little I used to have alot of "night terrors". This reminds me of those experiences. Even though they weren't good experiences, I take all experiences into account. This song is also epically dramatic, and Atsushi's vocals are my favorite in this song.

05>  Which 5 people are you passing this baton to? 

Erm.. I'll decide that later. x___X

Review coming soon, track for track. So far this album gets my vote for "Best Album of the Year". Hell, it just might become my fave B-T album.

a single moment shatters into a million instances
for a second, i hesitate to think of my future
one piece strays in a slightly different direction
and this is to be my destiny, set apart from others
                   
she, who loves me, casually wrapped her hands around my throat
senseless feeling. hopeless faith. when all this fades only you will exist
please continue to love me, with bloodstained hands
i can honestly say that i feel more pain than ever

in this dark place i will swim forever and grasp on tightly
a whisper coming from a far off voice i can not place
still, with the words ringing in my brain i can feel myself wither and burn

she, who cares for me, lovingly choked the last breath from my lungs
wonderous emotions. murderous intentions. i always knew you had it in you

this lonely day and new beginnings.
I can play the original human. You can play the helpless victim. When in reality, we're both just simple fools.

It's happening.. finally. I'm missing the older styles of Dir en grey.

Last night I popped in my copy of Macabre and this feeling of nostalgia hit me. All of a sudden all desire for Withering to Death ceased and since last night I've been listening to Gauze, MACABRE and Kisou. And I swore it would never happen. >\

In other news. April rocks my face off. <3333333

I have a new friend. We were once one person, but were seperated into two people at some point somehow.. and she became.. small and asian. But that's not the point. The point is, I have a new special friend! Yay.

Btw, I got Atsushi's "-EXPLOSION- Ai no Wakusei LIVE 2004" DVD. Totally kicks ass. In fact, I'll go watch it in a bit.

Also saw the live action Cutie Honey movie. I liked it for the most part. Wish there was more action though. Cutie was hot so it made up for it.

Wouldn't it be nice if FAKE? came to the US? I think they'd have quite the potential to be popular. Especially since Ken Lloyd is a good lookin' guy.

Just a thought.

Everyone is complaining about Withering to Death. Too much screaming, too heavy, not enough prettiness. But honestly. YOU FUCKING RETARDS. The CD is called.. WITHERING TO DEATH. Did you think it was going to have something like Yokan or JESSICA? I think not. Anyone who expected something remotely pretty or poppy needs to get their head checked.

I've decided Dir en grey's fanbase, even the ones who say they like Dir en grey's music, are a bunch of lying idiots. They don't understand Dir en grey, or their message. In fact, most of them probably just still listen to them because they find whatever members attractive and they're their "future husband" or some lame shit like that. Not to say that ALL Dir en grey fans are like that. You have ones like me( ;D ) who understand their message and why they construct the music the way it is. Enough egotisitcal rantings though.

Fuck you stupid ass fangirls. >_>

You know when you find a friend that you totally just have a great time with, not doing anything special to make that time awesome, and its still just plain old awesome? Yeah, well, me and Dana have that and that's great. We end up being stupid here and there, but I enjoy it. And those of you who know me, I usually hate acting stupid, but I don't mind it for some reason. Hooray for super awesome new friends.

I also blame Dana for getting me back into black metal. She may be a small girl, but she rocks harder than most I know. Damn you Dana, for making me take steps backwards in my musical world. But it's allllll good. <3

Princess Dana is a tennis rockstar.

Yeah, I met this girl named Dana last night among a group of friends. She's a cool chick and just about the only locally sane girl around. But I don't feel like writing alot so I'm just here to tell you that I'm still alive.
